title: Parliament logo (Funkadelic)
content:
Is there anything out there already similar to the "parliament" lettering seen below?   
 ![parliament](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021122935im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47237.jpg)   
   
thanks ahead of time.   
-phillip
author: eightone

comments.content:
Is there anything similar to the uncut basic font like this   
 ![parliament-uncut](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021122935im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47298.gif)   
   
thanks any which way.   
-phillip

[Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021122935/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=NEUTRAFACE-FO&sub=view) has a similar feel without the extra tabs on the P, A, and R. You could create those...   
   
Or look at [Kabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021122935/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/book/testdrive.html?s=PARLIAMENT&p=48)
